summary: A family with a great love for practical jokes is haunted by the family ghost Mr. Boogedy.
cast: Richard Masur|Mimi Kennedy|Tammy Lauren|David Faustino|Joshua Rudoy|Leonard Frey|Howard Witt|Eugene Levy|Ray Girardin|Alice Hirson|Karen Kondazian|Vincent Schiavelli|Jeff Abbott|Annie Abbott|Robert V. Barron|Michael Bartholomew|Minda Burr|Bill Capizzi|Kristen Clayton|Betty Cole|Terrence Evans|Matthew Hurley|Lora Marie Taylor
title: Bride of Boogedy
